content: Hi all, due to a new great opportunity, I won't be able to post here as much as I have in the recent past or share my thoughts maybe as feely as I have been. However, as a parting gift, I'd dumped (and I really mean "dump") a number of random thoughts on AI for TP into a GitHub repo (https://github.com/jasonrute/thoughts-on-ai-for-theorem-proving/). They are extremely rough, and mostly meandering. However, I think the section on search has some nice ideas which I wanted to share. This is a really great community, and I'm glad I could be so active here for the past 2 years.
